text: Lance Mackey (June 2, 1970 â€“ September 7, 2022) was an American dog musher and dog sled racer. He was from Fairbanks, Alaska. Mackey was a four-time winner of both the Yukon Quest and the Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race. Mackey died of Lung cancer on September 7, 2022 at the age of 52. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Anchorage, Alaska Category:Deaths from throat cancer
title: Lance Mackey
